items.sentence: A man who is his own lawyer has a fool for a client.
Actually, I have no intention of quitting right now.
Be careful what you wish for. You just might get it.
Tom has just installed an alarm system in his house.
Tom has more money than the rest of us put together.
Tom has put on weight since the last time I saw him.
Tom has written down a list of things we need to do.
Tom himself sewed on the button that had fallen off.
Tom hung his coat on one of the hooks near the door.
Why do you think Tom chose to become a psychologist?
Would you like to hear about what I did last summer?
Would you like to stay with us next summer vacation?
Would you mind picking up something on the way back?
Would you mind taking this book back to the library?
We considered going, but finally decided against it.
We could see the helicopter hovering above the pond.
We could see the lights of the town in the distance.
Tom wasn\'t able to convince Mary to come back home.
The priest who speaks French will be here next week.
The probability of Tom being punished is very small.
